properties.areaDesc: Bertie; Western Currituck; Hertford; Pasquotank; Camden; Perquimans; Eastern Currituck; Chowan; Gates
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 3 at 10:46PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
At 1045 PM EST, showers with moderate to locally heavy rainfall were
located along a line extending from near Gates to near Westover.
Movement was east at 35 mph.

Locations impacted include...
Currituck, Elizabeth City, Camden, Hertford, Winfall, Gatesville,
Elizabeth City State University, Ryland, Weeksville, South Mills,
Sunbury, Grandy, Gates, Colerain, Harrellsville, Cape Colony, Tyner,
Snug Harbor, Nixonton and Rockyhock.

Motorists should use extra caution in the vicinity of these showers.
Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Heavy
rain could cause ponding of water on roads, and possible minor
flooding of ditches and poor drainage areas.

NWSheadline: A LINE OF SHOWERS WITH HEAVY RAIN WILL AFFECT CAMDEN... PASQUOTANK...PERQUIMANS...EASTERN BERTIE...SOUTHEASTERN HERTFORD... GATES...CHOWAN AND CURRITUCK COUNTIES
